settings.title: about Us
settings.sub_head: Welcome to Palate Vape - Your Destination for Premium Vaping Products
settings.des:
Welcome to Palate Vape, your premier destination for exquisite vaping experiences. At Palate Vape, we are passionate about providing you with the finest selection of vaping products that cater to your discerning tastes.

Founded with a dedication to quality and customer satisfaction, Palate Vape is committed to offering a curated range of premium vaping essentials. We understand that vaping is not just a hobby but a lifestyle choice for many, and we strive to elevate your vaping journey with products that exceed expectations.

settings.description: At Palate Vape, we believe that vaping should be an enjoyable and hassle-free experience. That's why we're dedicated to offering reliable products that deliver exceptional flavor, satisfying vapor production, and long-lasting performance.  Join us on a journey of flavor exploration and vaping excellence. Shop with confidence at Palate Vape and indulge in the ultimate vaping indulgence.

settings.title: Designed to give you an easy vaping experience
settings.subtitle: Our Disposable Vape devices are meticulously designed to provide you with an effortless vaping experience, ensuring that every moment spent with our products is smooth and enjoyable. Explore our range of flavors and discover a new level of convenience and pleasure with Palate Vape.

settings.question: What if I received damaged or incorrect items?
settings.answer: If we make a mistake on your order, please contact us same day and we will amend the situation. The correct order will be replaced, no cost to the buyer. The same procedure will be implemented for damaged items.

settings.question: Can I cancel my order?
settings.answer: If you wish to make changes to your order, please call or fill out our contact form as soon as possible. We will gladly make any changes but is not guaranteed. Once your order has been processed or if 1 hour has passed since the purchase, we are no longer able to make any changes.

settings.question: How can find the status of your order?
settings.answer: Orders usually take anywhere between 24-48 business hours to fully process. Keep in mind our offices are open from 8:00am to 5:00 pm (PST) Monday through Friday; We do not ship on Weekends or major US holidays. If your order is placed on Friday fulfillment will be started the following Monday. Check order status.                                 When you place your order, you will receive a confirmation email with all your order details including: shipping/billing address, items purchased, total paid.

settings.question: How can I find the tracking info?
settings.answer: Orders usually take anywhere between 24-48 business hours to fully process. Keep in mind our offices are open from 8:00am to 5:00 pm (PST) Monday through Friday; We do not ship on Weekends or major US holidays. If your order is placed on Friday fulfillment will be started the following Monday.  Once your order has been shipped, you will receive an email containing the tracking number for your order. This automated email with the tracking info can take up to 24hrs after your order has shipped to land in your inbox. Transit times are generally between 2 to 7 business days, which varies depending on a variety of factors.

settings.question: How to return an item?
settings.answer: In order to process a return, you must first create an account. See the 'HOW DO I MAKE AN ACCOUNT?' section above for more detail.  Log into your account on the website (if you checked out as a guest you will need to create an account and fill out the form below with your info Navigate to "ACCOUNT" > "ORDERS" You will now see a list of your past orders. locate which Order # has the items you want to return Click on "Return Items?" for the order # Fill out all information and submit the return request Ship your Item/s back to us at: RFG Holdings LLC. Dba Palate Vape 338 Jackson St. Ste 5 Hayward, CA 94544: (insert your order # here) After we have received back the items we will process the return and either ship your replacement items or issue a refund Refunds take 3-8 days for your bank to process. After you have submitted a return request on the website, you have 7 days to ship the item back to us, if your return has not been shipped back within that 7 day window your request will be denied.

settings.head: FAQ
settings.title: Feel free to ask more Questions

settings.description: I'm impressed by the variety of delicious flavors available, each one delivering a unique and enjoyable vaping experience. The device is easy to use and requires no maintenance, making it ideal for on-the-go vaping. Overall, I highly recommend the Geek Bar Pulse for its convenience, flavor options, and performance.
settings.name: Sarah

settings.description: I experienced some inconsistency in flavor quality between different devices. On the positive side, the device is lightweight and easy to carry. However, I believe there are better options available in the market at a similar price point.
settings.name: Michael

settings.description: The Flum Gio 3000 Disposable Vape offers a decent vaping experience, but it falls short in some areas. The 5% nicotine strength provides a moderate throat hit, which may not be strong enough for heavy smokers. While the device is compact and easy to use, I found the flavor to be somewhat lacking in intensity.
settings.name: Daniel

settings.description: The RabBeats RC10000 Disposable Vape offers a reliable and satisfying vaping experience. The 5% nicotine strength provides a strong and satisfying throat hit, perfect for users craving a nicotine fix. I appreciate the ergonomic design and comfortable mouthpiece, which enhances the overall vaping experience.
settings.name: Jessica
